definition: cosecant (of angle), written cosec θ or csc θ
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: Beam Generation Program for computing Phase distribution function and Radiation pattern.
sentences.chinese: 餘割波束生成程序的計算相分佈函數和輻射模式。

sentences.english: The inspection method of cosecant beam antenna is discussed in depth in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對餘割波束天線的檢測方法進行了較深入的探討。
